answers.answer: I had preeclampsi.  I gained 10 lbs in 2 wks and had protein in my urine. Didnt have problem with blood pressure til i went into labor. i was just a few days before my due date when they diagnosed me with it amd they induced me that night.
I had to take blood pressure pills and fluid pills for a couple weeks after delivery. Good luck and keep us posted!
Thanks:) sadly its comforting to know im not the only one
Usually...rapid weight gain like that is due to water, and not fat. They might put you on diuretics to get rid of extra fluids in your body.
One of my friends recently had a little girl.  She gained 75 pounds during her pregnancy but about 50 of it was water weight and she lost that 50 almost right away after her daughter was born.

question: Hi i am 33 weeks...and was just told i put on 23lbs in 2weeks.., i have been diagnosed with superimposed preeclampsia ..but all other test are great including sugar etc.. the dr's seem a bit worried and now have to go in for further testing...has anyone had or been thru this?? Or know of any explanation...,thanks for your time :):)
title: unexplained weight gain
